info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:24PM CDT until July 24 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Crawford County in east central Illinois... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Palestine, or near Robinson, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Crawford County, including the following locations... Crawford County Airport and Merom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
